verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump] [V: told] [ARG2: Tim Russert] [ARGM-TMP: in 1999] [ARG1: that if he were president , he would ' negotiate like crazy ' with ' wacko ' North Korea before considering military action to stop the rogue nation 's nuclear weapons program] .
